definition[0]: used to tell someone who is learning to do something that they are doing it the right way, in order to encourage them
example[0]: Keep your knees bent and lean forward slightly. That’s the idea!
definition[1]: used to emphasize what the main point of something is, or to say that someone understands that point
example[1]: ‘You’re thinking of getting a new job?’ ‘Yeah, that’s the idea.’
